summary: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.
cast: Tommy Wiseau|Juliette Danielle|Greg Sestero|Philip Haldiman|Carolyn Minnott|Robyn Paris|Mike Holmes|Dan Janjigian|Kyle Vogt|Greg Ellery|Piper Gore|Kari McDermott|Jennifer Vanderbliek|Bennett Dunn|Padma Moyer|Daron Jennings|Thomas E. Webster|Nora DeMarcky|Arelle Mitkowski|Frank Willey|Amy Von Brock
keywords: imitating a chicken|breast cancer|unintentional humor|throwing a football|oversized clothes
title: The Room
